string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: Do not save what is left after saving, but spend what is left after saving - Warren Buffet
If you wish to get rich, save what you get. A fool can earn money; but it takes a wise man to save and dispose of it to his own advantage - Brigham Young
The habit of saving is itself an education. It fosters every virtue, teaches self-denial, cultivates the sense of order, trains to forethought, and so broadens the mind. - T. T. Munger
A benny saved is a penny earned - Benjamin Franklin
If you find yourself saying that you can’t afford to save money right now, you are lying to yourself -Anonymous
Never spend you money before you have earned it - Thomas Jefferson
I\’d like to live as a poor man with lots of money - Pablo Picasso
The art is not making money, but in keeping it - Proverb
The quickest way to double your money is to fold it in half and put it back into your pocket - Will Rogers
Success produces success, just as money produces money - Diane Ackerman
Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don\’t make - Donald Trump
You must learn to save first and spend afterwards - John Poole
Life can be beautiful. It doesn\’t have to be expensive - Christine Louise Holhbaum
Beware of little expenses; a small leak will sink a great ship. - Benjamin Franklin
Too many people spend money they haven\’t earned, to but things they don\’t want, to impress people they don\’t like. - Will Smith
When you invest, you are buying a day you don\’t have to work - Aya Laraya
The amount of money that a person has in his bank account is not determined by his starting capital, but by his knowledge about money and his ability to manage it properly - Sunday Adelaja
Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game. - Donald Trump
